oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chemical conversion and anodized coatings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MITTAL, CK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Salient features of chemical conversion and anodized Coatings with greater emphasis on process details and operating conditions and advancements taking place in the field are described. Information regarding the bath compositions and operating conditions for industrially important processes has also been included.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: TRANSACTIONS OF THE METAL FINISHERS ASSOCIATION OF INDIA, 4(4), 227-237
